t: Amazon.com : Buff Original Unisex BUFF Multifunctional Headwear : Sports & Outdoors
s: I noticed even if you customize a Buff through their site, the company still insists on getting that logo somewhere visible. Perhaps if more thought went into the logo design it could be acceptable, but between the name and the design and placement, etc. it's just a deal breaker. This would have to be sold for much cheaper to be worth it. I'm looking for another brand ...
